story:
Once upon a time, in a beautiful village nestled in the lush green mountains of Thailand, there lived a kind and curious little boy named Krit. Krit's parents were poor but hardworking, and they always made sure that Krit and his two older sisters had enough food and clothes to wear.

One day, as Krit was walking home from school, he found a small, shiny stone lying on the ground. He picked it up and examined it closely, noticing its deep blue color and the way it sparkled in the sunlight. Krit was immediately fascinated and decided to keep the stone as a special treasure.

That night, Krit couldn't stop thinking about the stone and all its pretty colors. As he lay in bed, he closed his eyes and imagined what it would be like to swim in a sea of shimmering blue water, just like the stone. He drifted off to sleep, still clutching the stone tightly in his hand.

Suddenly, Krit woke up to find himself lying on a sandy beach, surrounded by crystal-clear water that stretched out as far as the eye could see. The sun was shining brightly, and Krit couldn't believe his eyes. He looked down at his hand and saw that the stone was still there, but now it was glowing with a bright, pulsing light.

Krit got up and tentatively dipped his toes into the water. It was warm and inviting, so he waded in deeper, feeling the waves lap at his legs. Before he knew it, he was swimming in the sparkling blue sea, feeling a sense of joy and wonder that he had never experienced before.

As Krit swam, he noticed that the sea was full of incredible creatures, like flying fish that danced above the water's surface, and dolphins that leaped and played in the waves. He swam deeper into the sea, marveling at the beauty of the underwater world.

Suddenly, Krit saw a magnificent sea turtle swimming towards him. The turtle was enormous, with a shimmering gold shell and kind eyes that seemed to twinkle with wisdom. Krit reached out his hand, and the turtle gently took it in its flipper.

Together, they swam deeper into the sea, exploring the wonders of the underwater world. Krit saw schools of colorful fish, towering coral reefs, and even a sunken ship that was home to a group of playful sea otters.

As the sun began to set, Krit and the sea turtle swam back to the shore. Krit looked down at his hand and saw that the stone was no longer glowing. He knew that it was time to return to his own world, but he was grateful for the amazing adventure that he had experienced.

Krit woke up the next morning feeling refreshed and full of energy. He couldn't wait to tell his friends and family about his incredible dream, and he knew that the shiny blue stone would always be a cherished reminder of his journey to the sparkling blue sea.

And so, Krit learned that treasures come in all shapes and sizes, and that sometimes the most valuable treasures are the ones that we find deep within ourselves. And with that lesson in his heart, Krit grew up to be a kind, curious, and adventurous young man, cherishing every moment of his journey through life.

Good night, my dear son. May your dreams be filled with sparkling blue seas and magical adventures. Sweet dreams and may you always treasure the treasures that you find in your heart.
